alert.note: Alert for Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 5:10AM MST until January 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and areas of blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A break in snowfall is expected late Wednesday night into early Thursday. However, additional rounds of snow are expected later in the week.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
